name: Loki: Agent of Asgard #6
summary: The MARCH to AXIS continues! - Loki's back from the Tenth Realm - and facing his greatest challenge yet! Can you say... DOCTOR DOOM? - But with Valeria Richards in the mix - who's the hero of the story? And who's the villain? - A new jumping-on point for the series fans literally can't get enough of! Grab it while stocks last, true believer! - And looming in the wings: AXIS!

relations.title: Loki: Agent of Asgard Volume 2: I Cannot Tell a Lie
